pr_title: Initial PR to support storing account metadata in MySql database

timeline.message: Setup feature branch for mysql account store
Add AccountMetadata table schema and AccountTable class

Merge pull request #1 from Arun-LinkedIn/mysql-accounts-mybranch

Add AccountMetadata table schema and AccountTable class
Command line tool to initialize and compare/validate mysql tables with zk

Changes to:
1. Remove container information from accounts before populating Account table
2. Print more details for mismatched containers
Update helper method in AccountSerdeUtils to exclude containers while building json for Accounts (used while storing Accounts in DB)

Merge pull request #2 from Arun-LinkedIn/mysql-accounts-mybranch

Command line tool to initialize and compare/validate mysql tables with zk
Refactor/rename classes and add unit tests

+

+import com.github.ambry.config.VerifiableProperties;

+/**
+ * Config for MySql database connection.
+ */
+public class MySqlConfig {
+
+  public static final String MYSQL_URL = "mysql.url";
+  public static final String MYSQL_USER = "mysql.user";
+  public static final String MYSQL_PASSWORD = "mysql.password";
+  /**
+   * Flag indicating whether to use DirectHttps CosmosDB connection mode.
+   * Provides better performance but may not work with all firewall settings.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder where the CONTAINER_ID will be used. I don't see it in the table and container object should contain the id already.
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: containerId is a derived field in the table schema, and it will be used in update queries to be added.
replies.author: lightningrob

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, looks like the version is always 1, and when will it be bumped?
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: On updates (will be in the next PR)
